announcements.title: Nutrition Brief M/T Classrooms
announcements.content:
All of Monday PT will meet in Surge 104C. Seating will progress from SQ1 in the first rows depending on the room layout followed by SQ2 , SQ3, SQ4, SQ5, SQ6 for accountability purposes with ABG in back behind TRG.

Tuesday PT will meet in the following rooms by squadron: MCB 304 - SQ 1/2 | MCB 307 - SQ 3/4 | MCB 321 - SQ 5/6 | MCB 332 - ABG

announcements.title: Warrior PT W/TH
announcements.subtitle: Read the CONOP before PT W/TH
announcements.content: On PT W/TH, we will be having a Warrior PT day at the O-Course. Make sure you read the CONOP before you attend PT to understand how PT will be organized. Pass up questions to your chain of command.

announcements.title: ORI Resources
announcements.content: The ORI (Open Ranks Inspection) will be on Tuesday, 5 Oct, during LLAB. To prepare for the ORI, the Wing IG, C/Cook has attached resources. If you have any questions, pass them up your chain. ORI PPT - ORI Procedures

announcements.title: Concessions & Parking Volunteer Sign-ups
announcements.content: If you wish to volunteer to help out concessions or parking during football games, please fill out the concessions spreadsheet here, or the parking spreadsheet here. Volunteering counts for Honor Flight points. This is not mandatory and all cadets are encouraged to volunteer.
